rukus.text: We did send Noah to his people. He told them, "O my people! Worship Allah, you have no god other than Him! I do indeed fear for you the punishment of a dreadful Day
The leaders of his people said, "We do indeed see you to be in clear error
He said, "O my people! There is no error in me, but I am a Messenger from the Lord of the worlds
I deliver to you Messages of my Lord, and I advise you, and I know from Allah what you know not
Does it surprise you that a Reminder has come to you from your Lord through a man, from amongst you, so that he may warn you and you may fear Allah, and so that you may be treated with Mercy
And they refused to believe him, and We saved him and those with him in the Ark, and We drowned those who refused to believe in Our Verses/signs. They were indeed a blind people
